summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of East 75th Street, from 12th Avenue Northeast to 20th Avenue Northeast, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 9382 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
